articles.title: 1 Dead, 6 Missing As Himachal Sees Cloudburst, Flash Floods, Landslide
articles.description: A woman died in a landslide in Shimla while a cloudburst and flash floods led to several missing in Himachal Pradesh this morning. The state has been witnessing unrelenting rainfall since last night.
articles.content:
Flash floods and landslides are also being reported from across Himachal Pradesh.

articles.title: Agnipath Applications Break Air Force Recruitment Record Under Old System
articles.description: The Indian Air Force has received the highest number of applications under the new military recruitment programme, Agnipath, compared to the recruitment format that had been followed until now.
articles.content:
Indian Air Force (IAF) got 7,49,899 Agnipath applications

articles.title: Mahua Moitra unfollows TMC on Twitter after party condemns her comment on goddess Kaali
articles.description: Trinamool Congress MP Mahua Moitra has unfollowed the official Twitter handle of the TMC after her party distanced itself from her comments on Goddess Kaali.

articles.title: LPG Gas Cylinder Price Hike: Cooking Gas Becomes Costlier from Today; New Rates Here
articles.description: LPG Gas Cylinder Price Hike Today: In Delhi, a 14.2-kg LPG domestic cylinder will now cost Rs 1,053. Meanwhile, a 5-kg domestic cylinder price has been jumped by Rs 18 from today. However, the price of 19-kg commercial cylinder has been slashed by Rs 8.5.

articles.title: Ajmer Dargah cleric held over ‘beheading’ remark against Nupur Sharma
articles.description: An FIR was filed against the dargah 'khadim' Monday night after a video surfaced of Salman Chishti purportedly saying he would give his house to anyone who brings Nupur Sharma's head to him.

articles.title: UK PM names Nadhim Zahawi as new finance minister
articles.description: Downing Street said Queen Elizabeth II had approved the appointment of Zahawi, who came to Britain as a child with his Kurdish family not speaking any English, before forging a lucrative business career.
articles.content:

articles.title: Zee Anchor In Rahul Gandhi Fake News Released After Questioning: UP Cops
articles.description: Zee TV news anchor Rohit Ranjan was arrested for questioning and has since been released, said the Uttar Pradesh police, whose personnel were caught on camera this morning fighting and jostling with their Chhattisgarjh counterparts for his custody.
articles.content:
Rohit Ranjan was arrested days after the channel ran a misleading news item on Rahul Gandhi.
